It was translated at Yangdu and Lushan.

source_sentence: 優婆塞五戒經一卷(一名五相經)
translation: Upāsaka Five Precepts Sutra One Fascicle (A Sutra on the Five Marks)

source_sentence: 右宋孝武帝代北涼安陽侯沮渠京聲譯出長房錄。
translation: The Right Song Emperor Xiaowu translated the Changfang Catalogue on behalf of Juqu Jingsheng, the Anyang Hou of Northern Liang.

source_sentence: 真偽沙門經一卷(一名摩訶比丘經三紙)右宋孝武帝代沙門慧簡於鹿野寺譯。
translation: One Fascicle of the Sutra of the True and False Ascetics (a three-page translation of the Mahābhikṣu Sutra) Right Translated at Luye Temple by Emperor Xiaowu on behalf of the ascetic Huijian.
It was translated at Luye Temple on behalf of the ascetic Huijian during the reign of Emperor Xiaowu of the Song Dynasty.

source_sentence: 決定諸部毘尼一部二卷
translation: Determining the Divisions of the Scriptures: A Two-fascicle Commentary on the Mahābhikṣu Sutra

source_sentence: 右宋代昇明元年釋道儼依諸律出。
translation: Right, in the first year of his ascension in the Song dynasty, Shi Daoyan relied on the various vinaya texts.
See Changfang lu.
One Fascicle of the Sthavira Vinaya
In the preceding period, the right one was translated by the ascetic Mahāyāna in the Zhulin Temple in Guangzhou.

source_sentence: 沙門摩訶乘於廣州竹林寺譯。
translation: The ascetic Mahāyāna translated this text at the Zhulin Temple in Guangzhou.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue of Buddhist Texts.

source_sentence: 善見毘婆沙律一部一十八卷(四百二十六紙)右南齊武帝代沙門釋僧猗。
translation: Shanjian vibhāṣā-lu in one 18-volume work (426 sheets of paper) Right: In the reign of Emperor Wu of the Southern Qi dynasty, the ascetic Shi Sengyan.

source_sentence: 於廣州竹林寺請外國法師僧伽跋陀羅譯。
translation: He had it translated by the foreign master Saṃghabhadra at the Zhulin Temple in Guangzhou.
It was translated by the foreign master Sengbhadra at Zhulin Temple in Guangzhou.
Vipaśyin 1 vol.

source_sentence: 右齊永明年外國沙門釋法度譯。
translation: Right, a translation by the foreign ascetic Shi Fadou in the Yongming period of the Qi dynasty.
It appears in the Record of the Ratnings.

source_sentence: 弟子耆域述慢戒經一卷
translation: One Fascicle of the Sutra on the Precepts of Conceit, Explained by the Disciple Jīvaka

source_sentence: 右宋孝武代北涼沮渠京聲譯。
translation: Right Song Xiaowu dai Beiliang Juqu Jingsheng transl.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.
One Fascicle of the Sutra of the Regulations for Bhadrayānīya

source_sentence: 右宋孝武代北涼沮渠京聲譯。
translation: Right Song Xiaowu dai Beiliang Juqu Jingsheng transl.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.
A Record of the Differences Between the Sutras and the Vinaya in One Volume

source_sentence: 三乘無當律一卷(長房錄)
translation: Samyak-saṃyuktâgama-vinaya in one volume (Changfang lu)

source_sentence: 四部律所明輕重物名一卷(長房錄)比丘戒所出本末一卷(長房錄)諸律解一卷(長房錄)比丘波羅提木叉一卷(僧祐錄)結界文經一卷(僧祐錄)優波離問佛經一卷(或云優波離律二十三紙長房錄)應行律經一卷(三紙寶唱錄)比丘諸禁律一卷(僧祐錄)大沙門百一羯磨一卷(二十二紙長房錄)五戒報應經一卷(寶唱錄)瞻波國佛說戒經一卷(長房錄)目連問經一卷(二十七紙)沙彌尼十戒一卷五部威儀服飾經一卷(一名五部僧服色名經寶唱錄)賢者雜事經一卷(僧祐錄)在家律儀經一卷(長房錄)犍搥法一卷(長房錄)出律儀要一部二十二卷(長房錄)沙彌十戒并威儀一卷(二十一紙寶唱錄)沙彌離戒經一卷(長房錄)舍利弗問經一卷(十一紙長房錄)二百五十戒一卷(長房錄)優婆塞五學略論一部二卷(長房錄)薩婆多毘尼毘婆沙一部九卷(或八卷一百九十七紙長房錄)以上除正律本外並是諸律枝派。
translation: 四部律所明輕重物名一卷(長房錄)比丘戒所出本末一卷(長房錄)諸律解一卷(長房錄)比丘波羅提木叉一卷(僧祐錄)結界文經一卷(僧祐錄)優波離問佛經一卷(或云優波離律二十三紙長房錄)應行律經一卷(三紙寶唱錄)比丘諸禁律一卷(僧祐錄)大沙門百一羯磨一卷(二十二紙長房錄)五戒報應經一卷(寶唱錄)瞻波國佛說戒經一卷(長房錄)目連問經一卷(二十七紙)沙彌尼十戒一卷五部威儀服飾經一卷(一名五部僧服色名經寶唱錄)賢者雜事經一卷(僧祐錄)在家律儀經一卷(長房錄)犍搥法一卷(長房錄)出律儀要一部二十二卷(長房錄)沙彌十戒并威儀一卷(二十一紙寶唱錄)沙彌離戒經一卷(長房錄)舍利弗問經一卷(十一紙長房錄)二百五十戒一卷(長房錄)優婆塞五學略論一部二卷(長房錄)薩婆多毘尼毘婆沙一部九卷(或八卷一百九十七紙長房錄)以上除正律本外並是諸律枝派。

source_sentence: 小乘論(五十四部八百五十六卷)
translation: *Lesson on the Lesser Vehicle (54 sections, 856 volumes)

source_sentence: 阿毘曇九十八結法一卷(長房錄云阿毘曇九十八結經)右後漢安世高譯。
translation: One Fascicle of the Sutra on the Ninety-Eight Bonds of the Abhidharma (Changfang lu yun abhidharma ninety-eight binds) Translated by An Shigao of the Latter Han Dynasty.
It was translated by An Shigao in the later Han period.

source_sentence: 分別功德論一部五卷(或四卷或三卷七十二紙)右西晉代竺法護譯。
translation: Fenbie gongde lun a five-volume work (either four or three volumes of seventy-two pages) translated by Zhu Fahou in the late Western Jin dynasty.
It explains the meaning of the Incremental Āgamas.
From the Record of Dharmagupta.

source_sentence: 三法度論一部二卷(或三卷)
translation: Sanfadu lun (三法度論一一一二卷) (or 3 volumes)

source_sentence: 右東晉太元十六年僧伽提婆於廬山譯。
translation: The right translation was made by Sengadeva at Mount Lu in the 16th year of the Taiyuan era of the Eastern Jin dynasty.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 雜阿毘曇心一部十三卷
translation: Saṃyuktâbhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra in thirteen volumes
The right translation was made by the ascetic Faxian and Juexian in the third year of Emperor An's reign in the Eastern Jin dynasty.

source_sentence: 沙門法顯共覺賢譯是第二出與前秦僧伽跋澄出者大同小異。
translation: This is the second translation by the ascetic Faxian and Juexian, and it is much the same as the one produced by Saṃghabhadra in the former Qin dynasty.
It is from the Biographies of Eminent Monks.

source_sentence: 阿毘曇心一部十六卷(或十三卷)
translation: One Record of the Mind of the Abhidharma in Sixteen (or Thirteen) Fascicles

source_sentence: 右晉孝武帝代罽賓沙門僧伽提婆譯。
translation: Right, translated by Emperor Xiaowu of Jin on behalf of the Śākyamuni monk Saṃghadeva of Kāśmīra.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue of Buddhist Texts.
One Record of the Mind of the Abhidharma in Four Fascicles

source_sentence: 右晉孝武帝代僧伽提婆於廬山為遠法師譯。
translation: The Right Translation of the Saṃghadeva Commentary by Emperor Xiaowu of Jin for the Master Yuanfashi at Mount Lu.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue of Buddhist Texts.

source_sentence: 尊婆須蜜所集論一部十二卷(或十卷三百七紙)右前秦建元十九年僧伽跋澄共佛念譯。
translation: Zumba Sumisho ronsho a 12-volume work (or 10 volumes of 337 pages) translated by Senghabhadra and Fonian in the 19th year of the Qianqin emperor Jianyuan.
It appeared in the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 阿毘曇毘婆沙一部十四卷(或十一卷僧祐錄云雜阿毘曇毘婆沙或有心字)右前秦代僧伽跋澄。
translation: *Abhidharma-vibhāṣā in one fourteen-volume work (or eleven volumes, as recorded in Sengyou's Record, Za abhidharma-vibhāṣā or with the word mind) Right.
A translation of the Qin version of the book by the multitude of present-day translators.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.
One Abhidharma Heart: Five Fascicle Commentary

source_sentence: 右前秦建元年僧伽提婆共道安於長安譯。
translation: Right, translated by Saṃghadeva and Daōan at Chang'an in the first year of the Qianqin era.
It is from the records of Yishan Temple.

source_sentence: 鞞婆沙阿毘曇論一部十九卷(或十五卷或十四卷或云毘婆沙亦云廣說四百五十紙)右前秦建元年僧伽提婆於洛陽譯。
translation: Vibhāṣā Abhidharma-śāstra, a 19-volume work (some fifteen, some fourteen, some say Vibhāṣā, and some say 450 pages of extensive explanation) translated by Saṃghadeva at Luoyang in the first year of the Qin emperor's reign.
It was translated at Luoyang in the first millennium of the Qianqin era by Saṃghadeva.
Sanfadu lun (三法度論一一一二卷)

source_sentence: 右前秦曇摩難提於長安譯。
translation: The right translation was made in Chang'an by the pre-Qin Dharmanandi.
It differs slightly from the Saṃghadeva translation.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 阿毘曇八犍度一部三十卷(或二十卷一名迦旃延阿毘曇八犍度四百五十紙)右前秦建元年沙門僧伽提婆共竺佛念譯。
translation: Abhidharma-bhāgavatam (or one of the twenty volumes of the four hundred and fifty pages of Kātyāyana Abhidharma-bhāgavatam) was translated by the ascetic Saṃghadeva and Zhu Fonian in the first year of the Qianqin era.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 舍利弗阿毘曇一部三十卷(或二十卷或二十二卷七百六十紙)右後秦弘始十年沙門曇摩崛多共曇摩耶舍於長安譯。
translation: *Śāriputrâbhidharma: a 30-volume work (or 20 or 22 volumes of 760 pages) translated at Chang'an by the ascetic Dharmagupta and Dharmayaśas in the tenth year of the late Qin emperor Hongsi's reign.
It is published in the Changfang Catalogue of Buddhist Texts.

source_sentence: 成實論一部二十四卷(或二十卷或十六卷或十四卷四百七十七紙)右後秦羅什於長安譯。
translation: Chengshi lun (成實論) 1:24 (or 20, 16, or 14 volumes of 477 pages) Right Translated at Chang'an by Rāṣṭrapāla of the Latter Qin Dynasty.
It appeared in the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 阿毘曇八犍度毘婆沙一部八十四卷(或一百九卷或六十卷一千三百七十八紙)右北涼沮渠代浮陀跋摩共道挻等。
translation: Abhidharma-bhātu-vibhāṣā 1:84 (or 129 or 60 volumes of 1,378 pages) Right Translated in Guzang by the Northern Liang Dynasty's Juqu Dai Bodhidharma and Daoyuan et al.
It was translated in Guzang.
It was translated in Guzang.
Vātsīputrīya-dānapālaṃkāra-śāstra 1 vol.

source_sentence: 右後魏代興和年瞿曇般若留支。
translation: Right, the Gautama-prajñāruci in the year of the late Wei dynasty's reign of prosperity.
He translated it at the Jinhua Temple in Huedu.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 阿毘曇甘露味一部二卷(或云甘露味阿毘曇)右魏齊王代失譯。
translation: One Part of the Taste of the Nectar of the Abhidharma Two Fascicle Translation (Or, The Taste of the Nectar of the Abhidharma) Right After the Wei Dynasty, the king of Qi lost his translation.
It appeared in the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 眾事分阿毘曇論一部十二卷(二百三十七紙)右宋元嘉十二年文帝代求那跋陀羅於楊都譯。
translation: A Twelve-fascicle Record of the Abhidharma Treatise on the Merits (237 pages) Right Translated at Yangdu by Emperor Wen on behalf of Qunabhadra in the 12th year of the Song Dynasty.
It was translated at Yangdu by Emperor Wen on behalf of Gunabhadra in the 12th year of the Song dynasty.

source_sentence: 雜阿毘曇毘婆沙一部十四卷(第二出)右宋文帝元嘉十年僧伽跋摩於長干寺譯。
translation: Saṃyuktâbhidharma-vibhāṣā 1:14 (2nd edition) Right Translated by Saṃghabhadra at Changgansi in the 10th year of Emperor Wenjia's reign in the Song Dynasty.
It was translated at Changgansi in the tenth year of Emperor Wenjia of the Song dynasty.
Saṃyuktâbhidharma-hṛdaya-śāstra (Ten Fascicle Commentary)

source_sentence: 右宋元嘉三年伊葉波羅譯。
translation: The right translation was made by Iśvabhū in the third year of the Song dynasty.
It was dropped out at the end of the selection process.
From the Changfang Catalogue of Buddhist Texts.

source_sentence: 雜阿毘曇心一部十三卷(或十四卷三百二十七紙)右宋元嘉八年求那跋摩譯。
translation: Saṃyuktâbhidharma-hṛdaya-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbharma-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbharma-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbhidharma-jñānâbharma-jñâbhidharma.
It appeared in the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 解脫道論一部十三卷(或十二卷一百九十八紙)右梁代天監十四年僧伽婆羅。
translation: Jietuodao lun a 13-volume (or 12-volume, 198-page) right Liang dynasty Tianchuan 14 years of the Saṃghabhara.
He translated it at Zhangyun Hall in Yangdu.
It was translated at Zhangyun's Hall in Yangdu in the 14th year of Tiandi's reign.
One volume of the Treatise on the Discrimination of the Three Worlds

source_sentence: 右梁承聖年三藏真諦於廣州譯。
translation: Right, this translation of the Tripiṭaka of the True Truth was made in Guangzhou in the Chengsheng year of the Liang dynasty.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 法勝阿毘曇論一部六卷(一百三紙)右後齊天統年耶舍共法智譯。
translation: Fasheng abhidharma lun a six-volume work (130 pages) translated by Yeshe and Fazhi in the year of Tiantong of the late Qing dynasty.
It's also recorded in the Damo Uttarakuru Record.
Yao-Qin Dynasty Translation of the Recitation of the Buddha's Mind.
It's from the Records of the Internal Canon.

source_sentence: 別譯法勝阿毘曇心一部六卷(一百二十二紙)右齊天統五年耶舍共法智譯。
translation: Bieyi fasheng abhidharmin yiqie ye she and fazhi translated (one hundred and twenty-two pages) in the fifth year of the reign of Qi emperor.
It is from the Damo Uttarakuru Record.

source_sentence: 四諦論一部四卷(七十紙)
translation: A Four-fascicle Commentary on the Treatise on the Four Noble Truths (70 pages)

source_sentence: 右陳代三藏真諦於廣州南康郡譯。
translation: Right: A translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Chen dynasty by the True Truth in Nankang county, Guangzhou.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 隨相論一部二卷(三十四紙或云求那摩諦隨相論)右陳代三藏真諦譯。
translation: Sui xianglun a 2-fascicle work (34 pages or Qunamatī sui xianglun) Translated by Zenith of the Tripiṭaka in the Chen dynasty to the right.
It appears in the Records of the Internal Canon.
Shibabu lun (Shibabu lun) 1 volume (7 pages)
Right Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Chen dynasty by the True Truth.
It appears in the Internal Canon.

source_sentence: 部異執論一卷(九紙一名執部異論)右陳代三藏真諦於廣州制旨王園寺譯。
translation: Buzhiyi jinglun yiqie lun (Nine sheets of paper, one on the Buzhiyi lun) Right Translated by the Chan dynasty Sanzang Zentis at Wang Yuansi, Guangzhou, according to the order.
It appeared in the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 立世阿毘曇論一部十卷(一百七十三紙)右陳代永定三年三藏真諦。
translation: Lishiapitan lun a ten-volume work (one hundred and seventy-three pages) right translated by Sanzang Zentis in the third year of the Chan dynasty's reign.

source_sentence: 於廣州制旨王園二寺於始興郡譯。
translation: It was translated at the Second Temple of Wang Yuan in Zhixing County, Guangzhou, by Zuiji.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.
One volume of verses from the Kushya-śāstra
Right: The True Truth of the Chen-Dai Tripiṭaka.

source_sentence: 於廣州制旨王園二處譯。
translation: It was translated at the two locations of the King's Park in Zhizhi, Guangzhou.
It was translated at the two locations of the Wang Garden of the Order of Guangzhou.

source_sentence: 俱舍釋論一部二十二卷(四百五十八紙)右陳代三藏真諦。
translation: One Twenty-two Fascicle Commentary on the Śākyamuni Verses (448 pages) Right Translated by the Right Honored One, the Tripiṭaka of the Chen dynasty.
Translated at the Wang Yuan Temple, Shouji, Guangzhou.
It appeared in the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 須跋陀羅因緣論一部二卷
translation: Subhadra's Treatise on Causes and Conditions (1 vol.)

source_sentence: 右周武帝代三藏法師耶舍崛多。
translation: Yeshegupta, the Tripiṭaka Master of Emperor Wu of the Zhou dynasty, translated this scripture at the Shitianwang Temple.
He translated the text at the Shitennōji temple.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue of Buddhist Texts.

source_sentence: 大毘婆沙論一部二百卷(三千一百九紙)右大唐永徽年三藏玄奘於西京譯。
translation: A 200-volume translation of the Mahāvibhāṣā-śāstra (3,109 pages) by the Tripiṭaka Master Xuanzang in Xijing in the year of Yonghui of the Great Tang.
It appeared in the Records of the Inner Canon.

source_sentence: 順正理論一部八十卷(一千四百二十紙)右大唐永徽年三藏玄奘於大慈恩寺譯。
translation: Shunshō rilun 1 sūtra in 80 volumes (1,420 pages) Right Translated by Xuanzang, the Tripiṭaka Master, at Dacien Temple in the year of Yonghui of the Great Tang Dynasty.
It appeared in the commentaries of the internal scriptures.

source_sentence: 顯宗論一部四十卷(六百四十四紙)右大唐永徽年三藏玄奘於大慈恩寺譯。
translation: Xuanzong lun yiqieyi fang 40 rolls (644 pages) Right Translated at Dacien Temple by Xuanzang of the Tripiṭaka in the year of Yonghui of the Great Tang Dynasty.
It appeared in the commentaries of the internal canon.

source_sentence: 發智論一部二十卷(三百六十四紙)右大唐永徽年三藏玄奘於內宮中譯。
translation: Fazhi lun (發智論一一二十卷) (364紙) Right: A translation by the Tripiṭaka Master Xuanzang at the Inner Palace in the year of Yonghui of the Great Tang.
It appeared in the commentaries of the Tripiṭaka.

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨俱舍論一部三十卷(四百七十紙)右大唐顯慶年三藏玄奘於內宮中譯。
translation: Abhidharma-kauśalya-śāstra, a thirty-volume work (470 pages) translated by Xuanzang in the inner palace in the year of Xianqing of the Right Great Tang Dynasty.
It appeared in the commentaries of the Saṃdhinirmocana.

source_sentence: 俱舍論頌一卷(三十四紙)
translation: Commentary on the Kusāya-śāstra in One Volume (34 pages)
Right: A Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Great Tang by Xuanzang.
It is published in the Internal Canon.

source_sentence: 識身足論一部十六卷(二百七十一紙)右大唐顯慶年三藏玄奘於宮中譯。
translation: Śīlabhadra: A Sixteen-fascicle Commentary (Two Hundred and Seventy-One Sheets) Right Translated by Xuanzang of the Tripiṭaka in the Palace during the Reign of Xianqing in the Great Tang Dynasty.
It appeared in the internal canonical records.

source_sentence: 法蘊足論一部十二卷(一百九十二紙)右大唐顯慶年三藏玄奘於宮中譯。
translation: Dharmôdgata-śāstra: a twelve-volume work (192 pages) translated at the palace by Xuanzang, the Tripiṭaka philosopher, in the year of the Great Tang's reign of revelation.
It appeared in the commentaries of the internal scriptures.
Yibu zonglun lun yiqie (Treatise on the Different Divisions of the Wheel) 1 vol.
Right: A Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Great Tang by Xuanzang.
It appears in the commentaries of the Saṃdhinirmocana.

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨五事論一部二卷
translation: One Commentary on the Five Phenomena of the Abhidharma, 2 volumes
Right: A Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Great Tang by Xuanzang.
It is published in the Internal Canon.
The Prakaraṇapāda-śāstra in One Eighteen Fascicle
Right: A Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Great Tang by Xuanzang.
It is published in the Internal Canon.
A Three-Volume Set of Treatises on the Body of the Realms
Right: A Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Great Tang by Xuanzang.
It is published in the Internal Canon.

source_sentence: 集異門足論一部二十卷
translation: A Twenty-fascicle Collection of Different Aspects of the Abhidharma Path

source_sentence: 右大唐顯慶年三藏玄奘於宮中譯。
translation: The right translation was made by the Tripiṭaka Master Xuanzang at his palace in the year of the Great Tang's reign of revelation.

source_sentence: 右明五陰十二入九十八使。
translation: Right, he explains the twelve sense-fields of the five aggregates and the ninety-eight declivities.

source_sentence: 三彌底論一部四卷(或三卷或云三彌祗論四十紙)右出長房錄。
translation: Sanmei di lun a four-volume work (or three-volume work, or Sanmei gui lun on forty pages) right out of Changfang lu.

source_sentence: 辟支佛因緣論一部二卷(二十四紙)雜心論一部十六卷六足阿毘曇論一卷(出長房錄)賢聖集傳三十六部九十一卷佛所行讚傳一部五卷(一百五紙馬鳴菩薩讚)右東晉寶雲於楊都譯。
translation: The Pratyekabuddha Treatise on Causes and Conditions (2 volumes, 24 pages), the Zaxin lun (1 volume, 16 pages), the Liuzu abhidharma lun (1 volume, 6 pages), and the Biography of the Collection of Good and Noble Ones (36 parts, 91 volumes) are translated into five volumes (1,500 pages, the praises of Ma Ming Bodhisattva) by Jewel Cloud in Yangdu in the Eastern Jin dynasty.
It is from the Changfang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 阿育王傳一部七卷(或五卷一百一十五紙)右梁天監年僧伽婆羅於楊州譯。
translation: Aśoka Biographies: A Seven-fascicle (or Five-fascicle, One Hundred and Fifteen-Page) Translation Right Translated by Saṃghabhara at Yangzhou in the Year of Tianchuan in the Liang Dynasty.
It appears in the Records of the Internal Canon.

source_sentence: 付法藏傳一部四卷(九十四紙)
translation: A four-fascicle (94-page) translation of the Phuocang biography.

source_sentence: 付法藏經傳一部四卷(或二卷)

source_sentence: 右後魏代沙門吉迦夜譯。

source_sentence: 禪祕要經一部四卷(亦云禪祕要無經字)右吳支謙譯。

source_sentence: 禪祕要一部五卷(一名禪法要或為三卷七十紙)右宋元嘉年沙門曇摩蜜多譯。
translation: Secret Essentials of Chan in Five Fascicles (a translation of the Essentials of the Chan Dharma in three fascicles on 70 pages) Right Translated by the ascetic Dharmamitra in the Song Dynasty.

source_sentence: 禪祕要法一部三卷(或四卷七十六紙)右後秦弘始年羅什於長安譯出內典錄。
translation: Secret Essentials of Chan, a three-volume work (or four volumes of seventy-six pages) translated by Rāṣṭrapāla in Chang'an in the year of Hongsi's death in the late Qin Dynasty.

source_sentence: 百句喻集一部十卷(第三譯或五卷)右南齊永明年沙門求那毘地楊州毘耶寺譯。
translation: Collection of One Hundred Parables in Ten Volumes (3rd translation or 5 volumes) Right Translated by the Monk Qunapidi of Yangzhou Vaiye Temple in the Year of Yongming of the Southern Qi Dynasty.

source_sentence: 出長房錄百喻集一部四卷(僧伽私那撰四十四紙)右南齊永明十年沙門求那毘地譯。
translation: It is a four-volume translation of the Collection of One Hundred Parables (written by Sengjia xinna on forty-four sheets of paper) right translated by the monk Qunabidi in the tenth year of Yongming in the Southern Qi period.
It is a translation of a document published in the Saṃghavikrāmin.

source_sentence: 右南齊永明年沙門求那毘地譯。

source_sentence: 菩薩本緣集一部三卷(或四卷僧伽斯那譯撰五十三紙)右吳代支謙於江南譯。
translation: A Collection of the Bodhisattvas' Original Conditions in Three Volumes (or Four Volumes, translated and compiled by Sengasena on fifty-three sheets of paper) Right Translated by Zhi Qian in Jiangnan during the Wu dynasty.

source_sentence: 僧伽羅剎集一部三卷(或二卷或五卷九十九紙)右前秦代沙門曇摩難提譯。

source_sentence: 龍樹菩薩為禪陀迦王說要偈一卷(一名勸發諸王要偈七紙)右宋元嘉年求那跋摩譯。
